BJCP Style Guidelines 2015 — bjcp2015
text: Beer style guidelines BJCP (Beer Judge Certification Program) dataset containing general statistics 91 beer styles. Historical wild beers included.

title: BJCP Style Guidelines 2015 — bjcp2015
text: data frame 91 rows 14 variables: CategoryNo Number category CategoryName Name category Style_id ID beerstyle, subcategory (number letter) BeerStyle Name beerstyle (= subcategory) OGmin Original Gravity, minimum value OGmax Original Gravity, maximum value FGmin Final Gravity, minimum value FGmax Final Gravity, maximum value ABVmin Alcohol--Volume, minimum value ABVmax Alcohol--Volume, maximum value IBUmin International Bittering Units, minimum value IBUmax International Bittering Units, maximum value SRMmin Standard Reference Method color, minimum value SRMmax Standard Reference Method color, maximum value

title: BJCP Style Guidelines 2015 — bjcp2015
text: https://bjcp.org/stylecenter.php
